name: acm-contest
description: Flask App for FSU ACM Programming Contest
author: ACM at FSU

scripts.credit:upper: FLASK_CONFIG=../config/development.py python extra_credit.py credit/results_upper.tsv credit/spc2018ec.csv credit/upper_division
scripts.credit:lower: FLASK_CONFIG=../config/development.py python extra_credit.py credit/results_lower.tsv credit/spc2018ec.csv credit/lower_division
scripts.credit:tar: tar -cf credit/upper_division.tar credit/upper_division/* && tar -cf credit/lower_division.tar credit/lower_division/*
